name: Liberty Flights
description: Online store of UK made premium vaping devices and kits.
solutions: We created a brand new design
Migrated the site from ASP.NET to Angular & Nest.js
Added plenty of new features to improve the usability
outcome: Google Analytics performance improvements: Page views increased by 40%, and Bounce rate fell by 20%. The web application has become a way easier to support, scale, and manage.
